name: Name of your experiment
description: Explains the what and the why. What is the main idea? What is the purpose? Describes the coding process and implementation choices and gives a high level system overview.

name: Zach-inspiration
description: I decided to take inspiration from a work by boris87 (https://www.generativehut.com/post/harnessing-randomization-in-adobe-illustrator) that he created with Adobe Illustrator, but I want to create it with color.

name: Flow Fields
description: I wanted to create something using flow fields since it can give a cool effect.

name: Proximity music
description: The idea is to create a something where random shapes in random size will shift the sound level, to create the effect of diffrerent proximities.
